alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 12:22PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Otero County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1221 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Weed, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Otero County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
